## Description {#details}

Regular expression corresponding to the value given in one of the -pass-remarks&#42; command line flags.

Passes whose name matches this regexp will emit a diagnostic when calling the associated diagnostic function (emitOptimizationRemark, emitOptimizationRemarkMissed or emitOptimizationRemarkAnalysis).

Definition at line 24 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/diagnostichandler-cpp">DiagnosticHandler.cpp</a>.
